CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Customs Clearance relative to Weather Impacts?
SRP.A: Customs Clearance is {below} Weather Impacts in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Security Checks relative to Sanitary Inspections?
SRP.A: Security Checks is {below} Sanitary Inspections in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Documentation Errors relative to Political Disruptions?
SRP.A: Documentation Errors is {below} Political Disruptions in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total cross-border delays?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Customs Clearance}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total cross-border delays?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Documentation Errors}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Documentation Errors's minimum Cross-Border Delays in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Documentation Errors's minimum Cross-Border Delays is in {1967}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Security Checks's minimum Cross-Border Delays in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Security Checks's minimum Cross-Border Delays is in {1964}.

NC.Q: Was the total Cross-Border Delays in 1962 higher or lower than in 1966?
NC.A: The total cross-border delays in 1962 was {lower} than in 1966.

NC.Q: Between 1971 and 1977, was the average total Cross-Border Delays higher or lower than between 1973 and 1978?
NC.A: The average total cross-border delays between 1971 and 1977 was {lower} than between 1973 and 1978.

NC.Q: Was the total Cross-Border Delays in 1961 higher or lower than in 1963?
NC.A: The total cross-border delays in 1961 was {lower} than in 1963.

NC.Q: Between 1968 and 1977, was the average total Cross-Border Delays higher or lower than between 1963 and 1978?
NC.A: The average total cross-border delays between 1968 and 1977 was {higher} than between 1963 and 1978.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Customs Clearance} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Customs Clearance and Security Checks first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Customs Clearance and Security Checks first exchanged leading positions in {1960}.
